title: Help
description: Help screen to show the player how to play.

items.title: Language
items.description: Example: 'Look: Touch or click on a object or a character'
default: Look: Touch or click on a object or a character
Take: Drag the object onto the inventory icon
Combine: Drag one object onto another one
Use: Right mouse click or long press
Talk: Right mouse click or long press over a character
